price: Деди: «Сенга, мен билан бирга (юришга) сабр қила олмайсан, демаганмидим?»
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
